headline: Global Payments adds two directors to board after Elliott builds stake
summary: Global Payments said on Monday it has appointed two directors to its board in collaboration with activist hedge fund Elliott Investment Management. The move comes months after Elliott, one of the world's biggest activist investors, built a sizeable stake in the payments firm as it looks to narrow its focus solely on processing payments for businesses. Patricia Watson and Archana Deskus have been appointed to Global Payments' board, effective immediately.

headline: Global Payments Announces Board Additions to Enhance Shareholder Value Creation
summary: ATLANTA, September 29, 2025--Global Payments Inc. (NYSE: GPN), a leading worldwide provider of payment technology and software solutions, today announced the appointment of Patricia "Patty" Watson and Archana "Archie" Deskus as independent Board directors, effective immediately. Both Mses. Watson and Deskus possess deep financial technology and payments industry expertise.
